channel.title: Projects on chitti.dev
channel.description: Recent content in Projects on chitti.dev

item.title: Chitti - DevOps & DW/BI metadata Personal Assistant
item.description: ACCIO is a front end web application built to handle various project management tasks which was manually maintained in excel sheet. Manager and team leads maintains multiple version of excel sheet for the projects that team is currently working on. Lot of manual effort to syncup the statues and planning capacity every month. Technology Stack - MEAN stack web development - Mongodb, Express, AngularJs, NodeJs Below are some of the major features the tool provides

item.title: ACCIO - Project/Forecast Management tool
item.description: ACCIO is a front end web application built to handle various project management tasks which was manually maintained in excel sheet. Manager and team leads maintains multiple version of excel sheet for the projects that team is currently working on. Lot of manual effort to syncup the statues and planning capacity every month. Technology Stack - MEAN stack web development - Mongodb, Express, AngularJs, NodeJs Below are some of the major features the tool provides

item.title: Chitti - Alexa Skill
item.description: Chitti is an Alexa Skill built to handle all my media requests. This skill uses the media library thats build in mongodb, integrates with Plex and Kodi. Handles all audio/video playback requests in various speakers around the house. Built using - AWS, Alexa SDK, NodeJs, Mongodb, Kodi/Plex/Home Automation APIs Below are some of the Intents that Chitti can handle Play latest/new [language] songs Play [90s/2ks/80s] [language] songs Play composer [A R Rahman/Ilaiyaraja/Harris] songs Play [melodies/party/dance] songs Rate this songs as 4 star What is playing now

item.title: Lazy to find remote and Mute the speakers
item.description: Hopefully you’ve read my About Me page. I was running an online radio station which used to play songs 24x7 and its hosted from my laptop connected to speakers in living room. Songs play all the time and I do remote work. Whenever I get an incoming call or I make an outgoing call (to join meeting) I had to find my remote and reduce the speaker volume or mute it.
